changes.description: Implemented full UI for QuotedMessage component with reply icon, sender type indicator, truncated content, media icons, TailwindCSS styling, and responsive design.

dodCompleted: Reply icon (CornerUpLeft from lucide-react) displayed on left
Sender type shown as 'You' or 'Customer' based on senderType
Content truncated to 100 characters with ellipsis if longer
If mediaUrl exists, show small media icon or thumbnail (24x24px)
Background color: subtle gray (bg-gray-50 or bg-gray-100)
Border: left border with accent color (border-l-2 border-gray-400)
Deleted message shows 'Original message unavailable' placeholder
Empty content shows 'Media message' if mediaUrl exists
Responsive design works on mobile (text-sm on small screens)
notes: Successfully implemented QuotedMessage component UI with all required features. The component includes proper media type detection (image, video, audio), responsive design with TailwindCSS, and handles edge cases for deleted/empty messages.
